short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay updated with live IPL scores! Get real-time match updates, scores, and stats for your favorite teams in every game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the adrenaline of IPL matches without ever leaving your current tab! Our Chrome extension brings live scores directly to your browser, eliminating the need to switch tabs or interrupt your browsing experience. Whether you're shopping, working, or simply browsing the web, stay connected to the heart-pounding action of every IPL match with real-time updates that seamlessly appear on every tab. Enjoy the convenience of staying informed and entertained without any interruptions. Download now and immerse yourself in the excitement of IPL cricket, no matter where your browser takes you!
